response: {"message": "Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product! I think you'll love it, and I'm confident it will be a great fit for you. As we discuss the price, I want to be transparent and upfront - I'm looking for $1,200,000 for this product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm willing to negotiate further if needed. What do you think?", "product_price": 1200000}
